title: Waffle
description: A round or square Belgian waffle, baked to a golden brown. Most platforms depict this emoji topped with a pad of butter, and some include gooey syrup running down the sides.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the waffle emoji is a delectable treat, showcasing a golden-brown, perfectly crisp exterior with deep, inviting squares created by Appleâ€™s signature 3D rendering. Subtle shadows and highlights suggest its fluffy interior and warm texture, making it appear deliciously realistic. This emoji is commonly used to express cravings for breakfast, comfort food, or to signify a cozy, satisfying moment, all presented with Appleâ€™s characteristic tactile appeal.
